channel.title: House Track Supermode - based on another song
channel.description:
Hey guys... if your a house fan... you should know a song called supermode - tell me why.
Well, I just found out that is a rip off of an 80’s song called small town boy by bronski beat.
I never knew that it was a rip off

item.title: House Track Supermode - based on another song
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
By rip off I mean like unoriginal/stolen but I know it’s with permission

Read full topic
item.source: House Track Supermode - based on another song

item.title: House Track Supermode - based on another song
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Not sure I’d call it a rip-off, per se.

Rip-off suggests them trying to trick people, when they’ve not really done anything that music hasn’t been doing for decades – sampling, covering, remaking, interpolating, …

 

It’s like 50 cent and daft punk

(Mainstream) hip-hop since the '90s has basically been built on pillaging earlier (often better) tracks.

1976

https://www.youtube.com/embed/_H3Sv2zad6s

1995

https://www.youtube.com/embed/fPO76Jlnz6c

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Many songs are actually rip-offs in some way. If something works, it’s good to use again. There’s a lot of nuance involved of course, but yeah. Inspiration takes many forms it seems ;3
